name: Hit Me
overview: Use your gambling prowess to master the game of blackjack and beat the dealer as often as you possibly can in the fantastic Hit Me! The objective is to get a hand that is as close to the number 21 as possible. Set the stake for each hand and decide whether to gamble on, adding more cards to your hand or stick with what you have. Starting with a small stack of chips strategically play hands to increase your pot and become super rich!
